sections.TOP: The Life and Adventures of Elyo Grivas, First Sword of Braavos0233385xr1ib9ugb3376iyimgxlp18btogf0d1575302014-08-25T02:00:49ZThe Dragon Demands5014364'''''The Life and Adventures of Elyo Grivas, First Sword of Braavos''''' is a book which details the exploits of [[Elyo Grivas]], who was the [[First Sword of Braavos|First Sword]] of [[Braavos]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels there is no mention of a book by this name as there is no character named Elyo Grivas.
sections.History:
===Season 4===
Princess [[Shireen Baratheon]] gives the book to Ser [[Davos Seaworth]] as part of his reading lessons. It is one of the Princess's favorite books because it is filled with pirates and swordfights.<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref>

title: The Life and Adventures of Elyo Grivas, First Sword of Braavos
